snippet: Apple, which has stumbled in its efforts to get into social media, has talked with Twitter in recent months about making a strategic investment in it, according to people briefed on the matter.
abstract: Apple, which has stumbled in its efforts to get into social media, has talked with Twitter in recent months about making a strategic investment in it, according to people briefed on the matter.

headline.main: Apple Said to Consider Stake in Twitter

snippet: Westfield Stratford City in east London has over 300 stores, including Prada and Apple, presenting contrasts to its depressed neighborhood and ideals of amateurism.
abstract: Location of the Westfield Stratford City mall in east London, which is situated at the entrance of the Olympic park, has some worried that the Olympics will be remembered as a strange new hybrid of sports appreciation and consumerism gone wild; the mall and the event grounds are so close and seamlessly connected that they could easily be confused for a single development.

headline.main: Going to the Olympics? First Event Is Mall Walking
headline.print_headline: For Spectators, the First Event Is Mall Walking

snippet: Tech companies that were thought to be the foundation of a new Internet era declined this week.
